photoeffects: My Colors (My Colors Off, Vivid, Neutral, Sepia, Black & White, Positive Film, Lighter Skin Tone, Darker Skin Tone, Vivid Blue, Vivid Green, Vivid Red, Custom Color)
isosensitivity: AUTO, High ISO Auto (incorporating Motion Detection Technology), 80, 100, 200, 400, 800, 1600
afpointselection: Manual selection using FlexiZone AF/AE, Size (Normal, Small)
batteries: 4x Size-AA Alkaline or NiMH Batteries(NB4-300) (Alkalines supplied)
continuousshooting: ¹ Under conditions where the flash does not fire. ² Depending on memory card speed / capacity.
batterylife: ¹ Using the batteries and memory card format supplied with the camera, except where indicated.
flash: Canon Speedlites (220EX, 430EX II, 580EX, 580EX II (4)), Speedlite Transmitter ST-E2, Off-Camera Shoe Cord OC-E3 High Power Flash HF-DC1
afsystempoints: Face Detection, 1-point AF (Any position is available, fixed to centre or Face Select  and Track)
selftimer: Approx. 2 or 10 sec., Custom or FaceSelf-Timer
flashexposurecompensation: +/- 2 EV in 1/3 stop increments. Face Detection FE. Safety FE.
manualpoweradjustment: ¹ Not all functions of the flash are supported.
stillimagetype: JPEG compression, (Exif 2.2 [Exif Print] compliant) / Design rule for Camera File system, Digital Print Order Format [DPOF] Version 1.1 compliant
closestfocusingdistance: 0cm (W) from front of lens in Super Macro
mycameramymenu: Start-up image and camera sounds customisation. Menu customisation.
externalflash: ¹ Not all functions of the flash are supported.
construction: 13 elements in 11 groups (1 UD and 1 single-sided aspherical element)
modes: ¹ Recording pixels fixed at 1600 x 1200.
exposurecompensation: +/- 2 EV in 1/3 stop increments. i-Contrast for automatic dynamic range correction
brightness: Adjustable to one of two levels
meteringmodes: Evaluative (linked to Face Detection AF frame), Centre-weighted average, Spot (centre or linked to Face Detection AF or FlexiZone AF frame)
zoom: ¹ Depending on the image size selected. ² Digital zoom available for still image and standard movie modes only. Optical zoom may not be available during movie recording.
powersupplybatterychargers: Compact AC power adapter CA-PS700, Battery Charger Kit CBK4-300, Ni-MH Batteries NB4-300
movielength: ¹ Depending on memory card speed / capacity.
menulanguages: English, German, French, Dutch, Danish, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Chinese (traditional), Japanese, Russian, Portuguese, Korean, Greek, Polish, Czech, Hungarian, Turkish, Thai, Arabic, Ukrainian, Romanian, Farsi
